==== arrayToLocaleStringES2015.ts (25 errors) ====
    let str: string;
    const arr = [1, 2, 3];
    str = arr.toLocaleString(); // OK
              ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2339: Property 'toLocaleString' does not exist on type '{}'.
    str = arr.toLocaleString('en-US'); // OK
              ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

              ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
